      • data

        void data(MailData data)
   throws RejectExceptionExt,
          org.subethamail.smtp.TooMuchDataException,
          java.io.IOException
        A typical implementation of this method would follow the following pattern: 1. examine the complete mail data or only its headers 2. optionally wrap the data object for example to prepend trace data 3. invoke the next entity in the chain

        The passed MailData object will become the return value of MailTransaction.getData() until another filter replaces it possibly by wrapping it

        Throws:
        RejectExceptionExt
        org.subethamail.smtp.TooMuchDataException
        java.io.IOException
